seller.name: string // the legal name of the store or seller
seller.address: string // postal address of the store
seller.telephone: string // contact telephone number of the store
seller.vat_number: string // VAT registration number of the store
seller.pin: string // tax identification PIN of the store
seller.store_location: string // physical location or branch name of the store
seller.till_number: string // the specific till where the transaction took place

receipt.datetime: string // date and time of the transaction in ISO 8601 format

items.item_code: string // internal or barcode product code
items.description: string // name or description of the product
items.total_amount: number // total cost for this line item
items.tax_code: string // applicable tax category for the item
items.discount_description: string // reason or description of discount applied, if any
items.discount_amount: number // discount value applied to this item

receipt.total_lines: number // total number of distinct line items
receipt.total_before_discount: number // sum of item prices before any discount
receipt.total: number // the total amount of the purchase after VAT and discounts

tax_breakdown.tax_code: string // tax category code (e.g., A, B)
tax_breakdown.vatable_amount: number // portion of subtotal subject to this tax rate
tax_breakdown.vat_amount: number // tax amount for this category

receipt.payment_method: string // method of payment (e.g., M-Pesa, cash, card)

served_by: string // name of cashier or attendant who processed the sale

loyalty.customer_name: string // name of the loyalty program customer
loyalty.points_earned: number // points gained from this transaction
